item.title: How to use progress bars in Julia
item.description: Overview In Julia, you can easily use a progress bar to indicate the progress of a program. Code ProgressMeter.jl By placing the @showprogress macro from the ProgressMeter.jl package in a for loop, you can display the progress1. using ProgressMeter chi2 = [] @showprogress for n in 1:20000 push!(chi2, sum(randn(n) .^ 2)) end Compared to ProgressBars.jl below, the use of a macro makes the code more concise. ProgressBars.jl You can wrap
